prob_eq_zero_or_one:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ⁻¹' » -/
/-- On a probability space, the (pre)ergodicity condition is a zero one law. -/
theorem prob_eq_zero_or_one [ProbabilityMeasure μ] (hf : PreErgodic f μ) (hs : MeasurableSet s)
    (hs' : «expr ⁻¹' » f s = s) : μ s = 0 ∨ μ s = 1 := by simpa [hs] using hf.measure_self_or_compl_eq_zero hs hs'
#align prob_eq_zero_or_one prob_eq_zero_or_one
pre_ergodic_of_pre_ergodic_conjugate:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ⁻¹' » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ⁻¹' » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ⁻¹' » -/
theorem pre_ergodic_of_pre_ergodic_conjugate (hg : MeasurePreserving g μ μ') (hf : PreErgodic f μ) {f' : β → β}
    (h_comm : g ∘ f = f' ∘ g) : PreErgodic f' μ' :=
  ⟨by
    intro s hs₀ hs₁
    replace hs₁ : «expr ⁻¹' » f («expr ⁻¹' » g s) = «expr ⁻¹' » g s; · rw [← preimage_comp, h_comm, preimage_comp, hs₁]
    cases' hf.ae_empty_or_univ (hg.measurable hs₀) hs₁ with hs₂ hs₂ <;> [left, right]
    · simpa only [ae_eq_empty, hg.measure_preimage hs₀] using hs₂
    · simpa only [ae_eq_univ, ← preimage_compl, hg.measure_preimage hs₀.compl] using hs₂⟩
#align pre_ergodic_of_pre_ergodic_conjugate pre_ergodic_of_pre_ergodic_conjugate
pre_ergodic_conjugate_iff:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ≃ᵐ » -/
theorem pre_ergodic_conjugate_iff {e : «expr ≃ᵐ » α β} (h : MeasurePreserving e μ μ') :
    PreErgodic (e ∘ f ∘ e.symm) μ' ↔ PreErgodic f μ :=
  by
  refine'
    ⟨fun hf => pre_ergodic_of_pre_ergodic_conjugate (h.symm e) hf _, fun hf =>
      pre_ergodic_of_pre_ergodic_conjugate h hf _⟩
  · change (e.symm ∘ e) ∘ f ∘ e.symm = f ∘ e.symm
    rw [MeasurableEquiv.symm_comp_self, comp.left_id]
  · change e ∘ f = e ∘ f ∘ e.symm ∘ e
    rw [MeasurableEquiv.symm_comp_self, comp.right_id]
#align pre_ergodic_conjugate_iff pre_ergodic_conjugate_iff
of_iterate:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ^[ ]» -/
theorem of_iterate (n : ℕ) (hf : PreErgodic («expr ^[ ]» f n) μ) : PreErgodic f μ :=
  ⟨fun s hs hs' => hf.ae_empty_or_univ hs <| IsFixedPt.preimage_iterate hs' n⟩
#align of_iterate of_iterate
measure_self_or_compl_eq_zero:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ⁻¹' » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ᶜ» -/
/-
Copyright (c) 2022 Oliver Nash. All rights reserved.
Released under Apache 2.0 license as described in the file LICENSE.
Authors: Oliver Nash
-/
theorem measure_self_or_compl_eq_zero (hf : PreErgodic f μ) (hs : MeasurableSet s) (hs' : «expr ⁻¹' » f s = s) :
    μ s = 0 ∨ μ («expr ᶜ» s) = 0 := by simpa using hf.ae_empty_or_univ hs hs'
#align measure_self_or_compl_eq_zero measure_self_or_compl_eq_zero
ergodic_conjugate_iff:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ≃ᵐ » -/
theorem ergodic_conjugate_iff {e : «expr ≃ᵐ » α β} (h : MeasurePreserving e μ μ') :
    Ergodic (e ∘ f ∘ e.symm) μ' ↔ Ergodic f μ :=
  by
  have : measure_preserving (e ∘ f ∘ e.symm) μ' μ' ↔ measure_preserving f μ μ := by
    rw [h.comp_left_iff, (measure_preserving.symm e h).comp_right_iff]
  replace h : PreErgodic (e ∘ f ∘ e.symm) μ' ↔ PreErgodic f μ := h.pre_ergodic_conjugate_iff
  exact
    ⟨fun hf => { this.mp hf.to_measure_preserving, h.mp hf.to_pre_ergodic with }, fun hf =>
      { this.mpr hf.to_measure_preserving, h.mpr hf.to_pre_ergodic with }⟩
#align ergodic_conjugate_iff ergodic_conjugate_iff
ae_empty_or_univ_of_preimage_ae_le':
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ≤ᵐ[ ] » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ⁻¹' » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `ennreal.top -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr =ᵐ[ ] » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr =ᵐ[ ] » -/
/-- See also `ergodic.ae_empty_or_univ_of_preimage_ae_le`. -/
theorem ae_empty_or_univ_of_preimage_ae_le' (hf : Ergodic f μ) (hs : MeasurableSet s)
    (hs' : «expr ≤ᵐ[ ] » («expr ⁻¹' » f s) μ s) (h_fin : μ s ≠ ennreal.top) :
    «expr =ᵐ[ ] » s μ (∅ : Set α) ∨ «expr =ᵐ[ ] » s μ univ :=
  by
  refine' hf.quasi_ergodic.ae_empty_or_univ' hs _
  refine' ae_eq_of_ae_subset_of_measure_ge hs' (hf.measure_preimage hs).symm.le _ h_fin
  exact measurableSet_preimage hf.measurable hs
#align ae_empty_or_univ_of_preimage_ae_le' ae_empty_or_univ_of_preimage_ae_le'
ae_empty_or_univ_of_preimage_ae_le:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ≤ᵐ[ ] » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ⁻¹' » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr =ᵐ[ ] » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr =ᵐ[ ] » -/
theorem ae_empty_or_univ_of_preimage_ae_le (hf : Ergodic f μ) (hs : MeasurableSet s)
    (hs' : «expr ≤ᵐ[ ] » («expr ⁻¹' » f s) μ s) : «expr =ᵐ[ ] » s μ (∅ : Set α) ∨ «expr =ᵐ[ ] » s μ univ :=
  ae_empty_or_univ_of_preimage_ae_le' hf hs hs' <| measure_ne_top μ s
#align ae_empty_or_univ_of_preimage_ae_le ae_empty_or_univ_of_preimage_ae_le
ae_empty_or_univ_of_image_ae_le':
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ≤ᵐ[ ] » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ⁻¹' » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ≤ᵐ[ ] » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr '' » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `ennreal.top -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr =ᵐ[ ] » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr =ᵐ[ ] » -/
/-- See also `ergodic.ae_empty_or_univ_of_image_ae_le`. -/
theorem ae_empty_or_univ_of_image_ae_le' (hf : Ergodic f μ) (hs : MeasurableSet s)
    (hs' : «expr ≤ᵐ[ ] » («expr '' » f s) μ s) (h_fin : μ s ≠ ennreal.top) :
    «expr =ᵐ[ ] » s μ (∅ : Set α) ∨ «expr =ᵐ[ ] » s μ univ :=
  by
  replace hs' : «expr ≤ᵐ[ ] » s μ («expr ⁻¹' » f s) :=
    (HasSubset.Subset.eventuallyLE (subset_preimage_image f s)).trans (hf.quasi_measure_preserving.preimage_mono_ae hs')
  exact ae_empty_or_univ_of_ae_le_preimage' hf hs hs' h_fin
#align ae_empty_or_univ_of_image_ae_le' ae_empty_or_univ_of_image_ae_le'
ae_empty_or_univ_of_image_ae_le:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ≤ᵐ[ ] » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr '' » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr =ᵐ[ ] » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr =ᵐ[ ] » -/
theorem ae_empty_or_univ_of_image_ae_le (hf : Ergodic f μ) (hs : MeasurableSet s)
    (hs' : «expr ≤ᵐ[ ] » («expr '' » f s) μ s) : «expr =ᵐ[ ] » s μ (∅ : Set α) ∨ «expr =ᵐ[ ] » s μ univ :=
  ae_empty_or_univ_of_image_ae_le' hf hs hs' <| measure_ne_top μ s
#align ae_empty_or_univ_of_image_ae_le ae_empty_or_univ_of_image_ae_le
ae_empty_or_univ_of_ae_le_preimage':
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ⁻¹' » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `ennreal.top -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ≤ᵐ[ ] » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ⁻¹' » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `ennreal.top -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr =ᵐ[ ] » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr =ᵐ[ ] » -/
/-- See also `ergodic.ae_empty_or_univ_of_ae_le_preimage`. -/
theorem ae_empty_or_univ_of_ae_le_preimage' (hf : Ergodic f μ) (hs : MeasurableSet s)
    (hs' : «expr ≤ᵐ[ ] » s μ («expr ⁻¹' » f s)) (h_fin : μ s ≠ ennreal.top) :
    «expr =ᵐ[ ] » s μ (∅ : Set α) ∨ «expr =ᵐ[ ] » s μ univ :=
  by
  replace h_fin : μ («expr ⁻¹' » f s) ≠ ennreal.top; · rwa [hf.measure_preimage hs]
  refine' hf.quasi_ergodic.ae_empty_or_univ' hs _
  exact (ae_eq_of_ae_subset_of_measure_ge hs' (hf.measure_preimage hs).le hs h_fin).symm
#align ae_empty_or_univ_of_ae_le_preimage' ae_empty_or_univ_of_ae_le_preimage'
ae_empty_or_univ_of_ae_le_preimage:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ≤ᵐ[ ] » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ⁻¹' » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr =ᵐ[ ] » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr =ᵐ[ ] » -/
theorem ae_empty_or_univ_of_ae_le_preimage (hf : Ergodic f μ) (hs : MeasurableSet s)
    (hs' : «expr ≤ᵐ[ ] » s μ («expr ⁻¹' » f s)) : «expr =ᵐ[ ] » s μ (∅ : Set α) ∨ «expr =ᵐ[ ] » s μ univ :=
  ae_empty_or_univ_of_ae_le_preimage' hf hs hs' <| measure_ne_top μ s
#align ae_empty_or_univ_of_ae_le_preimage ae_empty_or_univ_of_ae_le_preimage
ae_empty_or_univ':
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr =ᵐ[ ] » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ⁻¹' » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr =ᵐ[ ] » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr =ᵐ[ ] » -/
/-- For a quasi ergodic map, sets that are almost invariant (rather than strictly invariant) are
still either almost empty or full. -/
theorem ae_empty_or_univ' (hf : QuasiErgodic f μ) (hs : MeasurableSet s) (hs' : «expr =ᵐ[ ] » («expr ⁻¹' » f s) μ s) :
    «expr =ᵐ[ ] » s μ (∅ : Set α) ∨ «expr =ᵐ[ ] » s μ univ :=
  by
  obtain ⟨t, h₀, h₁, h₂⟩ := hf.to_quasi_measure_preserving.exists_preimage_eq_of_preimage_ae hs hs'
  rcases hf.ae_empty_or_univ h₀ h₂ with (h₃ | h₃) <;> [left, right] <;> exact ae_eq_trans h₁.symm h₃
#align ae_empty_or_univ' ae_empty_or_univ'
QuasiErgodic:
#print QuasiErgodic /-
/-- An ergodic map is quasi ergodic. -/
theorem QuasiErgodic (hf : Ergodic f μ) : QuasiErgodic f μ :=
  { hf.to_pre_ergodic, hf.to_measure_preserving.quasi_measure_preserving with }
#align quasi_ergodic QuasiErgodic
-/
